ThingDef.label: blueprint: paragon
ThingDef.description: Paragon is the pinnacle of humanity's engineering when it comes to sniper rifles. Equipped with micro-onboard computer that gives this weapon a semi-intelligence that allows it to fire with inhuman accuracy.Complex ultra-tech firing mechanics built in; allow a fire rate beyond anything that any other known sniperrifle can offer.

ThingDef.label: blueprint: unleashed
ThingDef.description: An Ultra-Tech charged-blaster, unlike classic pulse-charge technology that charges each shot with unstable energy, this weapon release a big powerful blast of pure charged energy. Fires a single shot at rather short range, and has a rather long recharge time; but makes up for it more than enough just by the merit of it lethality. Developed by Glitterworldy Military Forces, in situations that require extreme firepower.
